ModMetaData.name: Custom Xenotypes Included
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Allows your custom xenotypes to show up randomly in the game in other factions, refugees, etc.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ If you enjoy my work and want to support me and my family, I take donations at: https://ko-fi.com/1trickpwnyta +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
